law.catch_line: Territorial application of KRS 353.500 to 353.720 -- Waste of oil and gas prohibited.

text.section: KRS 353.500 to 353.720 shall apply to all lands located in the Commonwealth, however owned, including any lands owned or administered by any government or any agency or political subdivision thereof, over which the Commonwealth has jurisdiction under its police power.

The production of oil or gas from any well in any pool unless a permit has been issued as required by KRS 353.500 to 353.720, or in violation of the spacing provisions of KRS 353.500 to 353.720, is prohibited; except that this subsection shall not prohibit the continuation of production of oil or gas from a well producing oil or gas on June 16, 1960.

law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 8, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 2. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 3, effective June 16, 1960.
